title: Go Nuts: RideFast Racing Nut Jobs Tubeless Valves are Optimized for Flat Repairs
content:
It sucks to get stuck roadside or trailside, with a flat tire and a stuck valve you can’t unstick. Happily, Nut Jobs is here to help. (What?) That’s correct; Southern California-based wheel builder RideFast Racing designs its new Nut Jobs alloy tubeless valves to help ease the pain of valves fused with tire sealant or […]

The post Go Nuts: RideFast Racing Nut Jobs Tubeless Valves are Optimized for Flat Repairs appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
